agal.name: DefaultShader3D
agal.vertexShader: // vc0 : world * view * projection matrix // va0 : vertex position // va1 : texture coordinates m44 op, va0, vc0 mov v0, va1
agal.fragmentShader: // v0 : texture coordinates // fs0 : diffuse map mov ft0, v0 tex ft1, ft0, fs0 <2d,repeat,linear> mov oc, ft1
